import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Planet3D from '../components/Planet3D'; import Planet3DGLB from '../components/Planet3DGLB'; import './Home.css'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const [selectedPlanet, setSelectedPlanet] = useState<'moon' | 'jupiter'>('moon'); const [planetConfig, setPlanetConfig] = useState({ size: 1, lightIntensity: 1, rotationSpeed: 1, shadowIntensity: 1 }); const handleConfigChange = (key: string, value: any) => { setPlanetConfig(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); }; return (

handleConfigChange('size', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('rotationSpeed', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('shadowIntensity', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('metalness', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('roughness', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('craterDensity', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('mountainHeight', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('surfaceDetail', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />

); }; export default Home;
